name: Makerverse Spirit Award
description: This award is given to a select few on behalf of Patrick Mockridge, the BREC team and all Founders' and Special Founders' token holders for demonstrating the Makerverse spirit and heart energy in a special way. This very rare award entitles the holder to unique and rare airdrop items and will also unlock secrets.

properties.simple_property: Makerverse Spirit Award Token issued by brec.io
